value:
"Hero"? The word sticks in my throat.
But it is fitting, I suppose.

Better war than a peace built
on suffering.

Strangers, everyone. You fight for
the unknown alongside unknowns.

Tell me of your world. Perhaps
I can offer advice...

May I have a moment? I must remove
this mask. It is sweltering underneath.
But it wouldn't do for you to see...

As if I were a common courier,
I come bearing greetings from
$Nf.
As is to be expected.

Hmph. Nothing more than a
minor setback.
This won't stop me. Nothing will.

Ah. A gift offered freely. May this
benefit us both.

You are in the presence of the Flame
Emperor. I am yours to command, if
you prove capable.

I am burdened with great purpose.
My path, the path I must follow,
stretches out before me...$k$pBy every right, I should seek to
free myself of this childish struggle...
And yet, something about you...$k$pTell me, would you ever consider
using your tactical skill in service
of my empire?$k$p...Only after your work here is done,
I imagine.$k$pThen I will stay. And perhaps the time
will come when I no longer have need
to don this mask before you...
せあっ！
散れ！
うぐっ！
小賢しい
Perish.
Ready yourself.
The end comes.
Feed them to the maggots.
The flame will never die...
Hmph.
You see what I choose to show you.
Your foolishness will be your end.
Terrible power has its uses...and use it I will.
Behold the power of the Flame Emperor!
Fódlan's history has been distorted for over a millennium...
Beasts hiding in the light. Monsters slithering in the dark. I will destroy them all.
Say the word, and all will be burned away...
Fine.
Now?
I am going.
